showerReviews.reviewText: So confortable and welcoming, restrooms neat clean that call our attention.   We got a few gift for us and our grandkids. The fresh food and drinks give us an energy for the road again. ‚Ä¶
Love‚Äôs gas station had the cleanest bathrooms I‚Äôve seen in a gas station in a long time. Good place to stop! üëç And we liked the tacos at Taco John‚Äôs. It‚Äôs in a beautiful area of Utah. ‚Ä¶

Big and clean rest stop.
Expect this from Love.
Food and drinks selection was good.
Clean and modern restrooms.

This gas station and rest stop is actually pretty convenient. I was impressed with the cleanliness of this location. When I walked in, I was greeted with a smell of fresh food. The restroom facilities are clean and there were people ‚Ä¶

Walked in this morning to get a shower was rudely told showers were not working. Not only once but twice by the rude grey haired lady.  However i come back out to my truck check the apit says 4 available. ‚Ä¶

9/3/24 @ 7am

This store was beautiful! Very clean! Organized and sanitized clean restrooms. ‚Ä¶

We stayed here one night.
RV sites are away from truckers, so noise wasn't too bad. The site was leveled and clean. All huckup worked. However, there are only three small trash cans for ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Its a very good parking lot where i parked my car to use the restroom.
Large location allowed us to park our truck and trailers so we could get gas and go in to get a bathroom break
Plenty of parking if you need a nap. Great hot food and bathrooms, good gas prices, easy to get in and out. Really nice people.

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: The ventilation in the shower is very good! (This is a common problem on Pilot! In most cases, it becomes very humid.) This gas station is small, but it is clean and tidy. There are no problems with parking spaces. There is a slight odor in ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ there was plenty of truck parking. I‚Äôm assuming because it‚Äôs in a small town. I stopped here because I am a truck driver and needed a shower. I‚Äôm relatively new so I did not have shower credits for pilot. I went inside to pay for a ‚Ä¶
The staff is very friendly and the place is super clean - mint in the shower just a cherry on top
I‚Äôve been driving for about 10 years and the employee ‚ÄúRed‚Äù (that‚Äôs his name) at this location has done the best job I‚Äôve seen in my entire career at cleaning the showers! ‚Ä¶

Of all the truck stops this has to be my favourite the staff is so friendly and aware of who is coming in. Let‚Äôs talk about the shower! A mint and nicely folded towel and rag! The food! Got me a biscuit this morning that was worth every ‚Ä¶
The shower only had 3 and work very slowly I was wait 1:30 hours
PARKING AVAILALE ALL NIGHT..GOOD SHOWER PRESSURE IN COLD WEATHER..
Fantastic Service, clean shower, hot food, cheap fuel. Can‚Äôt ask for more.

I gave this store 5 out of 5 stars b/c they were just down right nice ppl. Showers were clean to perfection, food was hot& fresh and there were plenty of parking. Small store with only 3 showers, but the best damn shower I've had in 4 years ‚Ä¶

Came in at 11:30pm, restrooms are filthy, got inline for a shower and after 40 min still 2nd inline‚Ä¶ went to check with cashier - was told they have 1 person and she is busy, went to check in the back all 3 showers are empty and not cleaned ‚Ä¶

locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Walked in this morning to get a shower was rudely told showers were not working. Not only once but twice by the rude grey haired lady.  However i come back out to my truck check the apit says 4 available. ‚Ä¶

Actually got a fully clean shower room for once. Truckers know the deal, staff usually doesn't have time to clean the showers, so we are used to clean towels but dirty toilets, and sinks. Not this place. Helen is the lady that provides the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ a month and Love‚Äôs is always my go-to stop. The shower was clean (not the cleanest of all the Love‚Äôs I‚Äôve been to), the staff did not impress with friendliness, ladies room always clean. Safe area, I love that they have RV hook ups ( ‚Ä¶

There are always multiple empty showers here when I walk in, and yet you stand around waiting for someone to do their job and either clean them or press the ever so hard to find button letting us know the shower is available. We're hundreds ‚Ä¶

Lots of some one else's hair on the floor of my shower. Washing machines need to be wiped out around seal of the tub. And could use a wipe down on out side,floor needs swept folding table needs wiped clean
These "water saving" shower heads don't work well if you need to shower twice as long or longer because there is no water pressure and don't spray well.
Great location, slow service. Waited 20 min for a shower being 1st in line, couldn‚Äôt buy anything from inside because she couldn‚Äôt scan my rewards card.
New location open.  Nice and clean location. They have taco Jones restaurant in this location. Friendly staff and clean shower.

locations.title: Flying J Dealer
locations.content: Flying J Dealer may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Stopped here 2nd time and very disappointed while  also 2nd time no shower no Bathroom facilities.Don‚Äôt stop and Fuel up and there. Truck Parking Lot is not Paved and big holes in the lots. They are not deserving FJ dealership .

Pilot J card discounts doesn't work here. Anything buy 1 get 1 free or anything free. Shower first come first service. No sign about truck fuel, hard to find for first time if pumps empty... Very friendly staff and clean shower.

‚Ä¶ sacrificing everything so that you all can enjoy the amenities that we haul while you go home every day. This is what every truck stop should be like as far as the friendly employees. They give me free coffee after purchasing a shower.
If you're a driver needing a shower i would roll on past this place

Another raggedy $hole gas station convenience store with fuel pumps.   Understaffed 4 showers not automated when I asked for a shower I was told by the cashier she would have to go clean one.  Not even a waiting list. No hot food.  DQ was ‚Ä¶
Went there yesterday with my spouse and got a shower they are always nice and clean and the staff are always friendly and helpful great truck stop to visit

Always great when places have food a great hot shower and fresh hot towels. Refreshments and snacks upon exiting the building. Pretty cheap on the wallet a bang for a bucc or two so not pricey at all. The workers there are friendly quick to ‚Ä¶

Stopped here for a shower & a quick snack. Had a nice gentleman from the tire & service shop come speak to me before I got in. Apparently, Randy had noticed one of my RV tires hopping. He offered to have a look at it so I brought it over. H ‚Ä¶

4 dirty vacant shower rooms. 2nd time here & still 4 dirty vacant showers. Cashier said no maintenance attendant here because of family emergency in her family. Her family manages the place & all work there. While granny cooking & grand- ‚Ä¶

The cashier was very pleasant and I appreciated the free coffee after my shower. The showers are not automated, so you have to approach the counter and give them your rewards card. The only negative is no wifi.

showerReviews.reviewText: Out of 3(diesel) pumps. Only 1 is working. Showers are small and not very clean. I paid cash across the street for a shower at loves. The staff is friendly. The pizza is nasty. If you‚Äôre here early, the chicken is OK, but it sits in the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ an area for trucks in the back.  This isn‚Äôt a full service TA so they don‚Äôt have truck service.  They do have 2 small showers and this is where the rating drops.  The showers are nice but small.  They are clean enough but when we went ‚Ä¶

Stopped here at 1030pm. Pumped diesel. Tried to go inside for a receipt and shower. Store was locked up. Nobody home. Sign said they were open until midnight. Next time I'll take my business across the street to the loves.
Can't take a shower through the app. Which forces you to pay cash. System is always down
very nice people gave me free shower and free coffee.
They don‚Äôt happy when you get shower bad
